charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1101_01:
One day, as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
walking around town, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Shauntal
interviewing Lusamine.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_02:
What normally happens is this: Necrozma attaches
itself to Solgaleo and forcefully absorbs its limitless
energy.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_03:
But, somehow, thanks to the light of the sync stone,
it appears that they are now able to maintain a
peaceful coexistence.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_04:
Oh, I see! Because of that, they don’t bother each
other. Very interesting...
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_05:
It’s not just that. They actually seem to be bringing
more out of each other. That’s the only
explanation. Their strength—
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_06:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t expect to
run into you here.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_0401_08:
That’s right. Shauntal wanted to ask me about my
new partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_0402_10:
Shauntal wanted to ask me about the relationship
between Necrozma and sync stones.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_11:
Yes, that’s right! I really want to put sync stones
in a novel I’m writing!
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_12:
That’s why I was asking Lusamine about
Necrozma!
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_13:
I also would like to uncover all the secrets of the
sync stones.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_14:
If I were able to do that, I’d be one step closer to
my dream of protecting all of the Aether
Foundation’s Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_15:
What a splendid dream! After hearing you speak,
I am filled to the brim with inspiration!
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_21:
During that interview just now, I was speaking
officially as president of the Aether Foundation.
I was trying to sound very professional...
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_22:
but actually, I’ve been completely caught up in my
day-to-day life here on Pasio lately.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_23:
I’ve been having so much fun here, especially now
that I’ve formed a team with my children. I’ve
been engrossed in our daily battles.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_24:
But from time to time, I start thinking that I should
spend more time researching sync stones...
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_29:
I still want to protect all Pokémon with my deep
love. My feelings on that haven’t changed one
little bit.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_30:
I have to protect both my family and Pokémon.
That’s very difficult, but as a mother and as
president, I have no choice but to do both.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_31:
With that in mind, I’ve got to forge ahead together
with Necrozma.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_32:
To show my children what I can do, I’m going to
go out there and battle. I’m going to win—and
keep winning!
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_0401_34: I have no intention of losing to you, either.
charaepi_ch0120_10_lusamine/2301_1201_37:
Heh heh... With a rival like you, I’ll have the
perfect opportunity to shine!
